text:
🇨🇦 Justin Trudeau's #Leadership in Canada (amid #COVID19) could've been a beacon for the 🇺🇲US and 🇬🇧UK to #FlattenTheCurve.

Despite this ≈12-Month #Data Break, cheers, to President Joe Biden. 🍀
